title: Treestump

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will gain a single charge of every ability used against you as the ability was when it was used (aka you can gain a Necronomicon-boosted Poison charge if the Poisoner had the Necronomicon). You **do not** gain immunities.
- Evil roles who target you and fail to kill you (including ones that can't kill) will learn that you are the Treestump.
- You cannot gain charges of conversion abilities.
- You cannot use your gained abilities as a Treestump.

desc:
Post 707
*You do not forget. Eternal and always watching, you never forget.*
Roleblock Immunity
Control Immunity
Conversion Immune

Abilities
- Choose to grow into a Tree at night.
